# Winter Chill (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration: I**nstantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 241

*You makes a sound like whistling wind and inscribe a snowflake shape in the air, willing a chill to overcome your foe.*

The target creature must succeed on a Fortitude save or take 1d6 points of cold damage and become [[Fatigued|fatigued]]. A creature with immunity to cold is not affected by this spell.
